about_the_game: Immortal Survivors is an independent meat pigeon game with a top-down perspective. Players will control 3 different types of immortals to grow in constant battles with monsters, and combine thousands of different skills to damage through continuous upgrades. . Try your best to survive in the cruel world of cultivating immortals.

short_description: Immortal Survivors is an independent rougelite ancient style game. Players can choose different teammates to form a special combat team and continuously upgrade and evolve in the battle with monsters to create their own model.
